Lightweight Directory Access Protocol version 2 (LDAPv2) to Historic Status

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This document recommends the retirement of version 2 of the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAPv2) and other dependent specifications, and discusses the reasons for doing so. This document recommends RFC 1777, 1778, 1779, 1781, and 2559 (as well as documents they superseded) be moved to Historic status.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档建议停用轻量级目录访问协议（LDAPv2）版本2和其他相关规范，并讨论了这样做的原因。本文件建议将RFC 1777、1778、1779、1781和2559（以及它们取代的文件）移至历史状态。

contents.text: Lightweight Directory Access Protocol, version 2
contents.zh-CHS: 轻型目录访问协议，版本2

contents.text: LDAPv2 (Lightweight Directory Access Protocol, version 2) [RFC1777][RFC1778][RFC1779] is an Internet Protocol used to access X.500-based directory services. This document recommends that LDAPv2 and other dependent specifications be retired. Specifically, this document recommends RFC 1777, 1778, 1779, 1781, and 2559 (as well as documents they superseded) be moved to Historic status. The reasons for taking this action are discussed below.
contents.zh-CHS: LDAPv2（轻型目录访问协议，版本2）[RFC1777][RFC1778][RFC1779]是一种用于访问基于X.500的目录服务的Internet协议。本文件建议撤销LDAPv2和其他相关规范。具体而言，本文件建议将RFC 1777、1778、1779、1781和2559（以及它们取代的文件）移至历史状态。采取这一行动的原因如下所述。

contents.text: LDAPv2 was published in 1995 as a Draft Standard. Since its publication, a number of inadequacies in the specification have been discovered. LDAPv3 [RFC3377] was published in 1997 as a Proposed Standard to resolve these inadequacies. While LDAPv3 is currently being revised [LDAPbis], it is clearly technically superior to LDAPv2.
contents.zh-CHS: LDAPv2于1995年作为标准草案发布。自发布以来，发现了规范中的一些不足之处。LDAPv3[RFC3377]于1997年发布，作为解决这些不足的建议标准。虽然LDAPv3目前正在修订[LDAPbis]，但它在技术上明显优于LDAPv2。

contents.text: The LDAPv2 specification is not generally adhered to; that is, an independently developed implementation of the specification would not interoperate with existing implementations, as existing
contents.zh-CHS: 通常不遵守LDAPv2规范；也就是说，独立开发的规范实现不会像现有的那样与现有实现进行互操作

contents.text: implementations use syntaxes and semantics different than those prescribed by the specification. Below are two examples.
contents.zh-CHS: 实现使用不同于规范规定的语法和语义。下面是两个例子。

contents.text: 1) Existing LDAPv2 implementations do not commonly restrict textual values to IA5 (ASCII) and T.61 (Teletex) as required by RFC 1777 and RFC 1778. Some existing implementations use ISO 8859-1, others use UCS-2, others use UTF-8, and some use the current local character set.
contents.zh-CHS: 1) 现有的LDAPv2实现通常不会按照RFC 1777和RFC 1778的要求将文本值限制为IA5（ASCII）和T.61（Teletex）。一些现有实现使用ISO 8859-1，其他实现使用UCS-2，其他实现使用UTF-8，一些实现使用当前本地字符集。

contents.text: 2) RFC 1777 requires use of the textual string associated with AttributeType in the X.500 Directory standards. However, existing implementations use the NAME associated with the AttributeType in the LDAPv3 schema [RFC2252]. That is, LDAPv2 requires the organization name attribute be named "organizationName", not "o".
contents.zh-CHS: 2) RFC1777要求在X.500目录标准中使用与AttributeType关联的文本字符串。但是，现有实现使用与LDAPv3模式[RFC2252]中的AttributeType关联的名称。也就是说，LDAPv2要求将organization name属性命名为“organizationName”，而不是“o”。

contents.text: In addition, LDAPv2 does not provide adequate security features for use on the Internet. LDAPv2 does not provide any mechanism for data integrity or confidentiality. LDAPv2 does not support modern authentication mechanisms such as those based on DIGEST-MD5, Kerberos V, and X.509 public keys.
contents.zh-CHS: 此外，LDAPv2没有提供足够的安全功能用于互联网。LDAPv2不提供任何数据完整性或机密性机制。LDAPv2不支持基于DIGEST-MD5、Kerberos V和X.509公钥的现代身份验证机制。

contents.text: Dependent Specifications
contents.zh-CHS: 从属规范

contents.text: Since the publication of RFC 1777, 1778, and 1779, there have been additional standard track RFCs published that are dependent on these technical specifications, including:
contents.zh-CHS: 自RFC 1777、1778和1779发布以来，已经发布了其他标准轨道RFC，这些RFC依赖于这些技术规范，包括：

contents.text: "Using the OSI Directory to Achieve User Friendly Naming" [RFC1781]
contents.zh-CHS: “使用OSI目录实现用户友好命名”[RFC1781]

contents.text: and
contents.zh-CHS: 和

contents.text: "Internet X.509 Public Key Infrastructure Operational Protocols - LDAPv2" [RFC2559].
contents.zh-CHS: “Internet X.509公钥基础设施操作协议-LDAPv2”[RFC2559]。

contents.text: RFC 1781 is a technical specification for "User Friendly Naming" which replies on particular syntaxes described in RFC 1779. RFC 2253, which replaced RFC 1779, eliminated support for the "User Friendly Naming" syntaxes. RFC 1781 is currently a Proposed Standard.
contents.zh-CHS: RFC1781是“用户友好命名”的技术规范，对RFC1779中描述的特定语法进行了回复。RFC2253取代了RFC1779，取消了对“用户友好命名”语法的支持。RFC 1781是目前提议的标准。

contents.text: RFC 2559 is primarily an applicability statement for using LDAPv2 in providing Public Key Infrastructure. It depends on RFC 1777 and updates RFC 1778. If LDAPv2 is moved to Historic status, so must this document. RFC 2559 is currently a Proposed Standard.
contents.zh-CHS: RFC 2559主要是一份关于使用LDAPv2提供公钥基础设施的适用性声明。它取决于RFC1777并更新RFC1778。如果LDAPv2移动到历史状态，则此文档也必须移动到历史状态。RFC 2559是目前提议的标准。

contents.text: Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 安全考虑

contents.text: LDAPv2 does not provide adequate security mechanisms for general use on the Internet. LDAPv3 offers far superior security mechanisms, including support for strong authentication and data confidentiality services. Moving LDAPv2 to Historic may improve the security of the Internet by encouraging implementation and use of LDAPv3.
contents.zh-CHS: LDAPv2没有提供足够的安全机制供互联网上的一般使用。LDAPv3提供了优越得多的安全机制，包括对强身份验证和数据保密服务的支持。通过鼓励实施和使用LDAPv3，将LDAPv2迁移到Historical可以提高互联网的安全性。

contents.text: Recommendations
contents.zh-CHS: 建议

contents.text: Developers should not implement LDAPv2 per RFC 1777, as such would result in an implementation that will not interoperate with existing LDAPv2 implementations. Developers should implement LDAPv3 instead.
contents.zh-CHS: 开发人员不应按照RFC 1777实现LDAPv2，因为这样会导致实现无法与现有LDAPv2实现互操作。开发人员应该实现LDAPv3。

contents.text: Deployers should recognize that significant interoperability issues exist between current LDAPv2 implementations. LDAPv3 is clearly technically superior to LDAPv2 and hence should be used instead.
contents.zh-CHS: 部署人员应该认识到当前LDAPv2实现之间存在重大的互操作性问题。LDAPv3在技术上明显优于LDAPv2，因此应改用LDAPv3。

contents.text: It is recommended that RFC 1777, RFC 1778, RFC 1779, RFC 1781, and RFC 2559 be moved to Historic status.
contents.zh-CHS: 建议将RFC 1777、RFC 1778、RFC 1779、RFC 1781和RFC 2559移至历史状态。

contents.text: The previously superseded specifications RFC 1484, 1485, 1487, and 1488 (by RFC 1781, 1779, 1777, and 1778, respectively) should also be moved to Historic status.
contents.zh-CHS: 先前被取代的规范RFC 1484、1485、1487和1488（分别由RFC 1781、1779、1777和1778）也应移至历史状态。
